name: Special Addons for Elementor
author: vagrant

sections.description:
The Addons plugin have 20+ stunning free widget for Elementor including Banner Advanced, Gallery, Countdown, WooCommerce, and many more.

Build your modern, unique and functional website with Special Addons for Elementor.
Sometimes, the basic Elementor widgets are not displaying all the ideas of your website. And, you need to spend a lot of time to customize each one, it will take a lot of effort.

Here, Special Addons for Elementor is for you – Save your time and bring values to your website. It offers unique and stunning widgets that fit your expectations.

Elementor and Special Addons will make your website perfect and unique.

21+ Free And Customizable Widgets For Elementor.

Advanced Banner
Banner Grid
Banner With Testimonials
Carousel For Before & After Section
Big Steps
Blog
Special Product Category
Category Product Counter
Collection Carousel
Countdown With Image
Featured Category
Gallery Content
Gallery Information
Gallery Masonry
Hero Video Banner
Info Special
Instagram
Item Info Popup
Products Featured Tabs
Product Information
Step Grid
Step List

Don’t hesitate. Download and activate Special Addons Today!

Docs
sections.faq:
Plugin is need fee?

No, we free 100%.
